## fails() function

Returns [Failure&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.failure.md) with the supplied error message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fails<T>(message: string): Failure<T>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

message


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Error message to be returned.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;

## Remarks

A `fails` alias was added in release 5.0 due to issues with the name `fail` being used test frameworks and libraries.
